projects.title: Pizzeria Japonese
projects.preview: A website for a Japanese-area pizzeria
projects.description: A website for a Japanese-area pizzeria where a customer can order pizza(s), selecting quantity, toppings and size. They are then presented with the total cost. Customers may toggle between Japanese and English languages and currencies.

projects.title: Xenia
projects.preview: A web app to locate nearby shelters according to resource needed
projects.description: With Xenia, users can find the nearest shelters that offer needed resources, find the nearest shelters that need resources donated, see resource levels for all shelters in real-time and donate resources to any shelter they choose.

projects.title: Text to Base Translator
projects.preview: A website for translating text to its base representation
projects.description: A website for translating text to its base representation, using icons, between 1 and 16. Useful for creating coded messages, art or artfully-coded message... art! Currently transportation icons are being used for the base representation - perhaps later iterations will feature user-supplied icons!

projects.title: Lunarleap
projects.preview: An app to track monthly goals and be inspired by those of others
projects.description: Lunarleap is an app for users to create monthly challenges, post updates to them, follow other users and explore challenges by category.
